title: Crime Alert 06.24.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.24.19
description:
Minnesota Uber driver saves woman injured in gun sale gone wrong. Driver carries severed part of body of hit pedestrian in his passenger seat. Alleged mobster's son orders a hit.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
